target_lcs.description: The LCS to which the transition should be done

program_sflash_assets.description: Indicates whether to program the assets which are placed into SFLASH

program_iak.description: Indicates whether to generate and program Initial Attestation Key

program_hash.description: Enables ASSET_HASH and FACTORY_HASH validation in NORMAL_PROVISIONED LCS

nv_counter_l1.description: L1 application NV counter. 0, if no update

nv_counter_l2.description: L2 application NV counter. 0, if no update

prov_oem_complete.description: Indicates OEM assets are finalized in SFLASH
prov_oem_complete.warning: Once the 'prov_oem_complete' parameter value is set to true, it cannot be changed! No further updates to SFLASH are allowed

ap_cm33.description: Configures the CM33 debug access port availability in the SECURE and NORMAL_PROVISIONED LCS

listen_window.description: Configures the listen window time to acquire the CM33 debug access port in the SECURE LCS

cm33_dbg.description: Configures the invasive debug of CM33 core

cm33_nid.description: Configures the non-invasive debug of CM33 core

cm33_spid.description: Configures the secure privileged invasive debug of CM33 core

cm33_spnid.description: Configures the secure privileged non-invasive debug of CM33 core

cm33_secure.description: Enables the CM33 secure AP interface

ap.description: Configures the System debug access port availability in the SECURE and NORMAL_PROVISIONED LCS

secure.description: Enables the system secure AP interface

mmio_restrictions.applicable_conf: No restrictions, SRSS_GENERAL2 only, No access

boot_cfg_id.description: A behavior for BOOT_APP_LAYOUT (BOOT_SIMPLE_APP applicable to NORMAL_PROVISIONED only)

boot_dual_bank_enable.description: Indicates whether to enable flash dual bank feature

boot_bank_ctr_offset.description: An offset from the start of each flash bank where a 32-bit counter for flash dual bank switching is placed

boot_auth_l1.description: Fast or full authentication configuration for L1 application

boot_auth_l2.description: Fast or full authentication configuration for L2 application

boot_auth_l2_enable.description: Indicates whether to enable L2 slot authentication by Boot FW

boot_move_app.description: Indicates whether the L2 application overwrites the L1 application. Relevant for the case when there is an application in the second slot

boot_app_layout.description: The memory layout for the applications defined by BOOT_CFG_ID. 0x32000000 - 0x33FFFFFF for secure addresses; 0x22000000 - 0x23FFFFFF for non-secure addresses

dfu_enable.description: Indicates whether Device Firmware Update is enabled

dfu_l1_update.description: Indicates whether to allow L1 update with DFU

pc1_handler.description: Used to switch to PC1 when it is a 'Special' PC

pc2_handler.description: Used to switch to PC2 when it is a 'Special' PC

pc3_handler.description: Used to switch to PC3 when it is a 'Special' PC

mpc_struct_ram.description: RAM MPC structures. The total number of RAM and Flash MPC structures must be less than 32

value.description: Offset and size in KB. The values must be multiple of 2 (e.g. 0 KB, 2 KB, 4 KB, 8 KB, ...)

attr.description: The MPC attributes for this memory region
attr.comment_1: WRN allow write, read, and NS only access
attr.comment_4: WR- read and write access, but NS=0 only

value.description: Offset and size are indexes where 1 equals 2 KB (e.g. 3 = 6 KB)

attr.description: The MPC attributes for this memory region
attr.comment_1: RWN allow read, write, and NS only access
attr.comment_4: RW- read and write access, but NS=0 only

mpc_struct_flash.description: Flash MPC structures. The total number of RAM and Flash MPC structures must be less than 32

value.description: Offset and size in KB. The values must be multiple of 2 (e.g. 0 KB, 2 KB, 4 KB, 8 KB, ...)

attr.description: The MPC attributes for this memory region
attr.comment_1: WRN allow read, write, and NS only access
attr.comment_4: WR- read and write access, but NS=0 only

oem_rot_public_key_0.description: Path to the OEM RoT public key 0

oem_rot_public_key_1.description: Path to the OEM RoT public key 1

raw_data_pc012.description: Path to a binary file containing custom data accessible in PC0, PC1, and PC2. Up to 256 bytes
